Package org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.profiles

Class HardTokenProfileWithPINEnvelope

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.internal.UpgradeableDataHashMap
      • org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.profiles.HardTokenProfile
        • org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.profiles.HardTokenProfileWithPINEnvelope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, IUpgradeableData, IPINEnvelopeSettings
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HardTokenProfileWithVisualLayout
    public abstract class HardTokenProfileWithPINEnvelope
extends HardTokenProfile
implements IPINEnvelopeSettings
    HardTokenProfileWithPINEnvelope is a basic class that should be inherited by all types of hardtokenprofiles that should have PIN envelope functionality.
    Version:
    $Id: HardTokenProfileWithPINEnvelope.java 22117 2015-10-29 10:53:42Z mikekushner $
    See Also:
